explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: Removed the undefined Logger and TAG usage by eliminating the custom logging call; relied on existing java.security.MessageDigest and java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException already present in the file.
exception_handling: Modified the catch block to directly call e.printStackTrace() and preserved the behavior of returning an empty string after the catch.
logic_customization: none; the MD5 computation and hex string conversion logic were preserved exactly as in the original snippet.
refactoring: Removed the final modifier from the method signature while keeping it public static; applied minor variable formatting without changing behavior.
misc: Minor formatting and comment retention for readability; no new custom API calls were introduced.
